name: icon-extractor-native
description: Native icon extractor module for Electron

scripts.copy-dist: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const src=path.join(__dirname,'build','Release','icon_extractor.node'); const distDir=path.join(__dirname,'dist','win32-x64-139'); const dst=path.join(distDir,'icon_extractor.node'); if(!fs.existsSync(distDir)) fs.mkdirSync(distDir,{recursive:true}); if(fs.existsSync(src)) fs.copyFileSync(src,dst); console.log('已复制到:',dst);"
scripts.install: npm run build && npm run copy-dist

author: Your Name
